Name: Interstellar_b26
Description:
REQUIRES CD2_beta_12b, MEVv5_4 AND DEA_a05t2. Interstellar, shortened as IS, is a spin off of FC_b23 with some interesting twists on modded enemies.
    b26: 
  - Resupply Cost adjusted for 1/2p setting: 2nd resupply and onward will cost 50 nitra instead of 60. No change at 3/4p setting.
  - Removed Magma Maggot wavespawner. I feel like the RNG damage that can lead to death is unhealthy for the sake of this difficulty.
  - Solaris: Adding a cooldown of 40s respectively to try to limit the amount of frequency they spawn on you.
  - Solaris, Architect, Battle Blimp: Attempt to fix an issue where two (three if Architect) of them can exist in the map. 
  - Fat Leech: now added PhysicalDamageMultiplier equal to an amount that you can kill with one damage upgrade Power Attack.
  - Barrager type enemies: 1p setting for SpawnAmountModifier and MaxSpawnCount now also applies to 2p setting.
  - Spitscreener: MaxSpawnCount 1p setting reduced to 1, and 2p setting now is reduced to 1, only at 3+ setting it will be at original value.
  - Shellbacks, Big Youngling: MaxSpawnCount at 1/2p setting reduced to 0.
  - Youngling (spawn in Salt Pits): MaxSpawnCount at 1/2p setting reduced to 3/6.
  - The Sun: Acknowledged DifficultyRating 175 instead (forgot to fix issue became a feature).
  - Sniper Turret removed DifficultyRating nerf (it doesn't do anything), instead replaced their base with DEA version that has 66.6% of original HP, and the projectile speed is slower by a half.
  - Moving structure of Cooldown on EDs into EnemyPool.
